AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: None
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: An Istari, also known as a wizard, is a Maiar spirit sent to earth in a human form to aid the Free Peoples against the threat of corruptive dark forces. They have no unique childhoods, as they are avatars of these spirits.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wandering wizard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wandered the world, seeking out ways to fulfill their Vala's requests through their adventures.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tower wizard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] fortified their position in the world by constructing a massive tower and tending to its servants. However, soaring to such great heights left [PAWN_objective] with an air of superiority that tended to upset [PAWN_possessive] servants and guests.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Woodland wizard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] mostly kept to themselves deep in the woods. Their reclusion in the woods lent to their expertise in wildlife flora and fauna.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alchemist wizard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] sought nothing more than to attune the elements to their aid by crafting concoctions, doodads, and salves from the flora and fauna around them for various purposes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: War wizard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was honed for battle over the centuries in service of [PAWN_possessive] Valar.
